member.name: T:Solution.Tools.Utilities.AesCryptUtil
member.summary: Class to handle the load and save from AES Crypt file format https://www.aescrypt.com/ REQUIRE: SharpAESCrypt

member.name: M:Solution.Tools.Utilities.AesCryptUtil.EncryptFile(System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Encrypt input data to AES Crypt format using the provided password
member.param: Byte array of the plain data

member.name: M:Solution.Tools.Utilities.AesCryptUtil.EncryptFile(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Encrypt input data to AES Crypt format using the provided password and save it to disk
member.param: Full path where to create encrypted file

member.name: M:Solution.Tools.Utilities.AesCryptUtil.EncryptFile(System.String,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Encrypt input data to AES Crypt format using the provided password and return it as stream

member.name: M:Solution.Tools.Utilities.AesCryptUtil.DecryptFile(System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Decrypt input data in AES Crypt format using the provided password
member.param: Byte array of the encrypted file

member.name: M:Solution.Tools.Utilities.AesCryptUtil.DecryptFile(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Decrypt input data in AES Crypt format using the provided password and save it on disk
member.param: Full path where to create decrypted file

member.name: M:Solution.Tools.Utilities.AesCryptUtil.DecryptFile(System.String,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Decrypt input data in AES Crypt format using the provided password and return as stream
